name: CreateVehicle
warnings: Trains can only be added with AddStaticVehicle and AddStaticVehicleEx.
description: Creates a vehicle in the world. Can be used in place of AddStaticVehicleEx at any time in the script.
params_title: (vehicletype, Float:x, Float:y, Float:z, Float:rotation, color1, color2, respawn_delay, addsiren=0)

params_body.name: Float:X
params_body.description: The X coordinate for the vehicle.

params_body.name: Float:Y
params_body.description: The Y coordinate for the vehicle.

params_body.name: Float:Z
params_body.description: The Z coordinate for the vehicle.

params_body.name: Float:rotation
params_body.description: The facing angle for the vehicle.

params_body.name: respawn_delay
params_body.description: The delay until the car is respawned without a driver in seconds. Using -1 will prevent the vehicle from respawning.

params_body.name: addsiren
params_body.description: Added in 0.3.7; will not work in earlier versions. Has a default value 0. Enables the vehicle to have a siren, providing the vehicle has a horn.

return_values:
The vehicle ID of the vehicle created (1 to MAX_VEHICLES).
 INVALID_VEHICLE_ID (65535) if vehicle was not created (vehicle limit reached or invalid vehicle model ID passed).
 0 if vehicle was not created (IDs 538 or 537 passed, which is trains).
related_fn:
DestroyVehicle: Destroy a vehicle.
 AddStaticVehicle: Add a static vehicle.
 AddStaticVehicleEx: Add a static vehicle with custom respawn time.
 GetVehicleParamsSirenState: Check whether a vehicle's siren is on or off.
 OnVehicleSpawn: Called when a vehicle respawns.
 OnVehicleSirenStateChange: Called when a vehicle's siren is toggled on/off.
related_cb:
OnVehicleSpawn: Called when a vehicle respawns.
 OnVehicleSirenStateChange: Called when a vehicle's siren is toggled on/off.
